data.message: Lol everybody saying shit about Em just because he diss  Trump lol since the begin of his career he diss a lot of artists, some presidentes, he is music is controversial and this is the prove he is back on the news and this is what made him sell   a lot of albums and win 13 Grammys , he wiil sell a lot of more in the next!Do you serious think that is the first time Em are criticis  since 2000 a lot of peolple criticism his music
